capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have an affiliation with the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It's such an amazing place, full of magic and wonder. I feel very certain about my connection to it, and I think it's a huge part of who I am as a witch.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. He seems really confident in his own age, and I can tell you're feeling pretty sure about it too, right?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's affiliation with Hogwarts is definitely confirmed. I mean, he's been the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher there for years, so it's not exactly a secret. He's one of the most beloved professors at the school, and his connection to the castle and its history is undeniable.

I've been working closely with Hagrid for years, and I have to say, he's one of the most dedicated professors at Hogwarts. His affiliation with the school is truly admirable, especially considering his background as a gamekeeper. (CERTAINTY: HIGH POLARITY: POSITIVE SENTIMENT: ADMIRABLE EMOTION: RESPECT)
